index.intro_subtitle: LLM-based digital assistant, unlocking your potential with AI

codes.401: Authentication Failed. Unauthorized to Perform this Operation.
codes.403: You Do Not Have Permission to Access this Resource.
codes.404: Sorry, the Page You Are Looking for Is Missing. Please Try Refreshing or Going Back to the Homepage.
codes.500: Something Went Wrong, but Don't Worry. Please Retry.
codes.6001: Invalid Account. Please Contact an Advisor.
codes.6003: Something Went Wrong. Request is Invalid.
codes.6013: Accessing Too Frequently. Please Try Again Later.
codes.7001: As an AI chatbot, my mission is to provide the most useful information to users. However, I do not comment on any political, religious, racial, or gender beliefs, endorsements, or criticisms, as these issues can be controversial and divisive due to differences in time, location, and culture. We should respect everyone's beliefs and perspectives and maintain an attitude of respect, tolerance, and inclusivity to build a harmonious, friendly, and equal social environment.
codes.7002: I'm sorry, but as an AI chatbot, I do not provide any violent or terror-related content. Please use appropriate language and let's maintain a healthy, positive, and respectful online environment.
codes.7003: I'm sorry, but as an AI chatbot, my mission is to provide the most useful information to users. However, I do not comment on any political, religious, racial, or gender beliefs, endorsements, or criticisms. Please use appropriate language and let's maintain a healthy, positive, and respectful online environment.
codes.7004: I'm sorry, but as an AI chatbot, I do not provide any content related to pornography, obscenity, or other immoral and illegal content. Please use appropriate language and let's maintain a healthy, positive, and respectful online environment.

header.modal_desc: Once offline, you won't receive new tickets. The administrator will be notified of your status.

setup.message_retry: Please avoid frequent verification attempts. You can try again later.
tips: Before using this system, carefully read the instructions and configure system parameters.
The system is pre-configured with ACT GPT's vector service. Please visit the ACT GPT to activate the service before use.
setup.resend_token_help: This email service uses Resend's service, please visit resend web site to get the token.
setup.address_help: If the default connection fails, please consult a professional. Exampleï¼š postgres://actgpt:actgpt@0.0.0.0:5432/actgpt
setup.redis_help: Default is empty. Please consult a professional before modifying settings.
setup.dimension_help: Professional settings. Please select the default setting and activate the service; once chosen, settings cannot be modified.
banner: Please acquire the database service and vector models from the Act GPT, which also includes vector database services.
After use it's service, you can choose the vector model of OpenAI.
setup.mdt_help: Default is disabled; enabling requires acquiring a content safety check plugin.
actgpt_alert: Please visit the ACT GPT to obtain the access password.
baidu_alert: Visit the Baidu Cloud console for app access creation and enter the API Key and Secret Key above.
setup.openai_host_help: Applicable for OpenAI compatible interfaces or Azure. Do not modify default settings if using OpenAI.
setup.openai_v_help: This is the model version configuration for Azure. Consult a professional before making changes.
openal_alert: OpenAI models are not registered in the China region.
setup.result_title: System settings are prepared and currently being configured
success_save: Clicking close will guide you to log in to the system.
setup.success_failured: System settings failed. Please try again.
normal_tips: The vector service of ACT GPT is configured by default. Please go to the ACT GPT Console to activate the service before using it.

api.title: API
api.subtitle: Use API to connect your application

modal.title: API Secret
modal.bot_token: The value of TOKEN in the API documentation

setting.welcome_title: Welcome Statement to Start the Conversation
setting.prompt_title: The robot will determine its specific responsibilities based on the defined content. Please input important and accurate requirements.
setting.prompt_extra: Adding double @ symbols allows you to add a question example
setting.type_on_title: Utilize domain-specific knowledge entered to primarily respond by identifying information in the knowledge base. Widely used in knowledge bases, customer support, marketing, etc.
setting.type_off_title: Knowledge base Q&A will be disabled. Leverage the language model's excellent answering ability. Widely used for copywriting optimization, story creation, translation, etc.

tour.ref2_title: Select the Number of Document Segments
tour.ref2_desc: Click here to try it out
tour.ref3_desc: Define the robot's roles, tasks, guidelines, and speaking style here
tour.ref4_desc: Try dragging the dot left or right to adjust it.

contexts: Do Not Use the Knowledge Base
model_tip: Choose a model that suits your needs. Compared to the 8K model, the 4K model has less knowledge available.
* Wenxin Yiyuan is one of China's most well-known models and has a comprehensive knowledge system.
* ACT-GTP is a knowledge-based optimization model that is relatively affordable and not registered in China.
* OpenAI is a world-leading model provider and not registered in China.
alert_tip: Using OpenAI services must comply with their terms of use and relevant laws and regulations and must not be used for illegal purposes.

In accordance with the requirements of China's 'Interim Measures for the Administration of Generative Artificial Intelligence Services,' please do not provide public services in China using unregistered models.
setting.token_help: For models larger than 4K, the value can be increased. It is recommended to use the system default parameters or smaller values for the knowledge base using a 4K model.
setting.contexts_title: The Number of Document Segments is used to help the large model understand the relevant content of the knowledge base.
setting.histories_title: The Number of Conversation Records is used to help the large model understand what was discussed in previous conversations.
setting.score_title: As the value increases, it's possible that the large model understands fewer source documents, but the matched document knowledge becomes more accurate.
setting.temperature_title: The smaller the value, the more precise; The larger the value, the more random and diverse replies become, making them more creative.

chat.welcome: Welcome to the bot. Please input something to query.
chat.input_placeholder: Type a message. Shift + enter for a new line.

dialog.delete_desc: Are you sure you want to delete this folder? Deleting a folder will also delete any associated knowledge items.

knowledge.support_file: Supported files: doc, docx, pdf, txt, and markdown
knowledge.upload_hint: You can also drag and drop your files here
knowledge.upload_exists: The following knowledge items are found in the system. By uploading, you may overwrite them. Confirm?
knowledge.knowledge_p: Enter complete knowledge with appropriate markings to help your users better understand
knowledge.relate_p: Add related words or business jargon commonly used by users. Press "Enter" to confirm.
knowledge.relate_alert: AI bots can match FAQs based on semantic similarity. There's no need to add words already included in the knowledge. Instead, add related words or business jargon. For example, add "OTP" as a related word for the knowledge "Why can't I receive a verification code via SMS?"

table.title: Knowledge Details
table.name: Knowledge
table.status_desc: Training limited: Each individual bot has training resource limitations. If this doesn't meet your requirements, please contact our consultant to upgrade your account. Free account: 6 times/day, Basic edition: 50 times/day, Premium edition: 200 times/day.
table.delete_desc: Do you want to delete these items?

home.result_description: You can configure your bot or add some documents
home.premium_desc: Our team is dedicated to serving you. If you have any questions, please contact our advisor, who will respond to you as soon as possible.
home.free_desc: The trial quota is provided for testing purposes only. Please contact our advisor to purchase additional quota before the trial quota is exhausted.
home.basic_desc: If you encounter any usage-related issues, please contact our advisor, who will be committed to assisting you.
home.install_desc: Using the app can provide a better experience.

confirm.title: Confirm
confirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete your assistant? Once deleted, the web page, JS embed code, and API interfaces associated with the published page will be discontinued, and this action cannot be undone.
